extendedInfo.description: The application is called Keep Fridge which can be checked what food is in fridge and in freezer. Keep Fridge application is based on Android 2.3.3.Through the Keep Fridge application, it can help to find the remaining food in fridge and the application also notifies users daily after end of expiration date.  Keep Fridge application has picture function. When you put the food information in the list, user can be used the food image on details through two ways; from taking a shot or stored gallery. In addition, it can be searched food recipe through Google Recipe Search when user wants to find out the recipe.Enjoy Keep Fridge!
